channel.title: Alpha Radish NFT Series
channel.description:
![Twitter-Cover|690x230](upload://3birj44Jo0Ilv9hOeaONgLAfZ8l.jpeg)
Alpha Radish NFT is the first product of the Radish Platform. A 10,000 unique Radishes designed to act as a *"keycard"* for holders and collectors to unlock special features on the Radish Platform that will be built on the RADIX DLT.
**UTILITIES: TBA** **PRICE: TBA**
**BRIEF SUMMARY OF RADISH PLATFORM:** An emerging all-in-one ecosystem that will be built on RADIX DLT. It primarily act as a gateway for Radish token holders to enjoy perks and benefit, a platform for NFT Creators to unleash their inner creativity and for Game Developers to cultivate their ideas.
**LINKS:** Website: TBA
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Radish_Root Telegram: https://t.me/radishroot
